item.title: THANK YOU FOR CHOOSING EKC. FOR SUPPORT LIKE FACEBOOK.COM/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG- EKC 13.6 HALLOWEEN EDITION PUSHED- BETTER LIVE TV DEFAULT CLICK PUT IN- SEARCH FUNCTION SWITCHED TO A NEW SYSTEM- MOVIES SHORTCUTS CHANGED TO COVENANT (BOB WAS HAVING ISSUES- HD MOVIES STILL,AVAILABLE UNDER MOVIES IN BOB UNLEASHED HD)
DONATIONS ARE ALWAYS VERY APPRECIATED-IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO DONATE YOU CAN AT PAYPAL.ME/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG - YOU CAN PURCHASE PRELOADED DEVICES AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM

IT APPEARS THAT BOB UNLEASHED HAS THEIR SERVERS OFFLINE. IT SHOULD COME BACK ONLINE SHORTLY. I PUSHED A MINOR UPDATE. YOU WILL GET NO PROMPT. TOO MINOR TO PROMPT EVERYONE. TO GET IT YOU CAN FORCE AN UPDATE PRMOPT UNDER SETTING - IT WILL HAVE NO VERSION CHANGE - JUST CLICK FRESH INSTALL AND FORCE CLOSE LIKE ALWAYS - KODI 17.4 INSTALL HAS BEEN FIXED UNDER MAINTENANCE - JUST CLICK ON IT AND FOLLOW THE PROMPTS - LIVE TV HAS BEEN UP AND DOWN - MSOME DAYS WORKING GREAT UNDER DEFAUALT - SOME DAYS WITH BUFFERING - MOBDRO SEEMS TO HAVE THE MOST CONSISTANT QUALITY STREAMS FOR LIVE TV

IF ANYONE IS INTERESTED IN ADVERTISING THROUGH EKC, I CAN PUSH AN AD TO EVERYONE ALL DAY FOR BUSINESSES, EKC IS ALL OVER THE USA. 38000 DOWNLOADS AND COUNTING - PLAYERS KLUB SIGN UP SITE IS ACTIVE AGAIN. COST IS $5 A MONTH AND YOU GET GREAT LIVE TV. SIGN UP AT BIT.LY/PLAYERSIPTV-AFTER YOU MAKE AN ACCOUNT SIMPLY ENTER IN YOUR LOG IN INFO UNDER LIVE TV IN THE PK LOG IN SECTION
IF YOU REQUIRE A VPN, PLEASE VISIT BIT.LY/PRIVACYVPN - EKC PHONE NUMBER WILL BE DISCONTINUED STARTING OCTOBER. CONTACT US VIA OUR FACEBOOK PAGE OR ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG@GMAIL.COM FOR SUPPORT
